metadata.name: Oddlings Game Club (OGC) Genesis1
metadata.description: The Oddlings Game Club (OGC) Genesis Collection is a collection of hand-drawn features procedurally composed into 555 unique collectible character NFTs based on the Oddlings mobile game by Serious Props.  The Genesis collection is an exclusive collection for OGC Main Collection Whitelisters. OGC NFT owners enjoy benefits such as profit sharing from the mobile game launching this Spring, special utility on OGC land in the Sandbox metaverse, membership in the OGC DAO and other long-term benefits.
